What do you thing is missing in Stock that should be added in NEAR ? Because NEAR was (mostly) FAR without the UI, the super/hyper sonic effect and the aero stress.

If you want a NEAR experience edit the mach curve in stock to make them flat.

Where to find this Mach curve?

Where to find this Mach curve?

In the Physics.cfg in the KSP directory there are a variety of float curves defined - the 'machcurves' affect drag based on mach value. I think. But don't edit Physics.cfg, because sarbian added the ability to modify those values in ModuleManager. You can also view the curves in the debug menu under Aero I think.
